{{Wired embedded system |brand=Seagate |model=BlackArmor NAS |revision=440/420 |asin=B0020HR7DE |est_release_date=04/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=4.74 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F5608U0D-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU128M8DE-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CN1 |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=PCIe to SATA RAID Controller;Marvell;88SE6121;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Low Power Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850A;;1;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;On Semi;ADT7473;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ LP LDO, RTC;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;1;,,, 3A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;ANPEC;APL1085;;1;,,, 3A 12V Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;ANPEC;APW7145;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4818B;;1;,,, Dual D-type Positive-Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AHC74;;3;,,, 8-Bit Serial-In, Parallel-Out Shift Register;NXP;74HC164D;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;TI;SN74LVC32A;;1;,,, Hex Buffer with Open-Drain Outputs;NXP;74LVC07A;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;NXP;74LVC00A;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, fan |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.18; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.18;KW LSP v4.2.7 patch21; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:10:75 }} {{TagLine|BlackArmor NAS 440/420}} :{{SupportPage|https://www.seagate.com/support/external-hard-drives/network-storage/blackarmor-nas-400-series/}}
"081512-1", "SHASTA MB" and "48.61U01.011" are silkscreened on the board.
